content.value: To provide clothes, school supplies, and other necessities to low income youth in the greater Boston area to give youth more opportunity to focus on their academics and goals.
They were struggling to keep track of donations and to ignite excitement about donating.

We developed an iOS app that tracks an individual’s donations and impact level based on how many people were motivated to donate because of the individual’s social media campaigning and advertising. This way, Catie’s Closet donators can get a deeper understanding of how their work and donations are impacting the community.
